data.name: Circle Empires Tactics Soundtrack
data.detailed_description: Composed by Sigurd Jøhnk-Jensen from Denmark, this original soundtrack contains the 10 tracks for Circle Empires Tactics. Please consider supporting him by getting this soundtrack.
data.about_the_game: Composed by Sigurd Jøhnk-Jensen from Denmark, this original soundtrack contains the 10 tracks for Circle Empires Tactics. Please consider supporting him by getting this soundtrack.
data.short_description: Composed by Sigurd Jøhnk-Jensen from Denmark, this original soundtrack contains the 10 tracks for Circle Empires Tactics. Please consider supporting him by getting this soundtrack.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Storage: 25 MB available space
  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 325 MB available space
